Fix error canceling tool-loop with left-button (when the user starts drawing with right-button).
Add ToolLoop::Button enum type to avoid hardcoded 0 and 1 values.
Remove old lines to build aseprite in dist.sh.
Fix preview command: now previous/next frame keys can be used again (fixed issue #39).
Minor changes in README.html and added curl and xfree86 licenses.
"curl" is compiled statically so "net" library must be compiled with CURL_STATICLIB flag.

Fix problems generating a lot of consecutive "undo" entries when the palette were modified.
+ Added Undo::graftUndoerInLastGroup() member function.
+ Modify the PaletteEntryEditor to group a sequence of SetPaletteColors
  undoers in the same group using the new Undo::graftUndoerInLastGroup().
Palette editor now is redrawn when the palette changes externally (e.g. by undo/redo actions).
Add FULLSCREEN_PLATFORM constant (as in branch 0.8).
Adjust TODO.txt entries.
Minor change in CMakeLists.txt.
Fix problems loading/saving .png files with non-zero transparent index.
Add comments to export sprite sheet command.
Add "Export Sprite Sheet" command.
Add ComboBox::Change signal (to replace JI_SIGNAL_COMBOBOX_SELECT in the future).
Remove unused JI_SIGNAL_COMBOBOX_CHANGE signal.
Modify layout of Import/Cancel buttons.
Fix my website's URL.

Fix error deleting the mini-editor after the color bar is destroyed.
The "editors" module was moved out from LegacyModules class.
Fix problem with new lines.
Add "Import Sprite Sheet" command (part of issue #4).
New line fix in cmd_new_file.cpp.
UndoTransaction::newLayer() returns a LayerImage.
Destroy editors first to avoid disconnection from dead signals.
Fix bug switching current fg color (X key) and updating Editor's brush preview.
Fix problem losing the mouse capture on Windows platform when the mouse leaves the windows.
Replace "QuickReference" and "Donate" commands with "Launch".
Fix problems compiling on Linux with GCC.
Fix src/app/check_update.cpp compilation error with the renamed cfg.h to ini_file.h.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
Merge branch 'ft-updater'
Add support for "waitdays" attribute to control the "check for updates" frequency from the server.
Add ENABLE_UPDATER flag to disable the automatic updater.
Remove requirement of ddraw.lib library, so we can compile with the latest DirectX SDK.

Add automatic check for updates with app::CheckUpdateThreadLauncher
and show notifications in StatusBar.
+ Added updater library.
+ Removed "Check for New Version" command.
Add LinkLabel::get/setUrl().

Fix problem where aseprite.ini is not saved when flush_config_file() is called.
+ Flush "config_override" file in flush_config_file().

Fix issue #29: error using a non-const reference as parameter
in NullableIterator::setIterator() when a const-reference is the
expected type.
Add Sha1 class to base-lib.
Fix bug with dead FileItems in fileitems_map.
Replace JList and JLink usage in filesel.cpp with FileItemList and NullableIterator.

Fix problem in PopupFrame::onProcessMessage() where key-pressed events
are lost when the popup frame is focused.

Move src/core/ to src/
+ Renamed cfg.cpp to ini_file.cpp
Avoid to start with both colors selected (FG & BG) at the start in the color-bar.

Modify PaletteView selection, replacing the "rectangle-range" with
the normal behavior for Ctrl+click: select several palette entries
one by one.
Add a label to show the selected palette entry in the Palette Editor.

Generate a palette change event when a color entry is modified
using the Palette Editor (and set_current_palette() is not used).
Listen to palette changes in ColorSelector.

Fix problem regenerating the recent file menu.
+ Added Widget::deferDelete().
+ Removed schedule_rebuild_recent_list().
+ Renamed app_realloc_recent_list() to app_rebuild_recent_list().
+ Removed JM_DEFERREDFREE message, MessageDefFree struct, and
  jwidget_free_deferred() function.
Fix a bug using fop->format when it's NULL in fop_free() (introduced in previous commit).

Fix issue #9: GIF files are loaded as Indexed images now.
+ Added support for non-zero transparent index.
+ Added fop_post_load() to do post-load processing which need user-interaction.
+ Added FileFormat::onPostLoad/onDestroyData members.
+ Added Document::addSprite().

Now right-clicking a tab shows a popup-menu with useful options for the document.
+ Added OpenInFolder and OpenWithApp commands.
+ Added Launcher::openFolder.
+ Added document_tab_popup_menu.
Add OVERRIDE in JpegFormat::onGetFormatOptions declaration.
Update some TODO entries.
Remove docs/manual/ directory.
Update README.html file (contact, authors, credits, etc.) and add more licenses.
Improve dist.sh file to include only "git grep -l" files in source dist.
Add net-lib (HttpRequest/Response classes).
Add base::Version class.
Add curl library source code.
Add TODO entries for JRect and JRegion.
Rename COPYING to LICENSE.txt.
Add button to disable mini editor.
Minor changes (C style comments to C++ style).

Fix several menu glitches.
+ Fixed issue #10 (Alt+sequence of underlined letters is working now).
+ Close the whole menu hierarchy when Alt key is released and then
  pressed again.
+ Close all menus when a command is executed.

Add PaintFlags to SelectBoxState editor state.
The SelectBoxState::PaintGrid will be used for the future "import sheet" command.
Fix problem closing the last "normal" editor (because the existence of the new "mini" editor).
Convert menu widgets to Menu, MenuItem, MenuBox, and MenuBar classes.

Fix IcoFormat::onLoad() clearing the image as first step
because sometimes some pixels are not set.
Add DropDownButton widget.
Fix compilation of unit tests on Linux with pthreads.
Fix objects_container_impl_unittest.
Fix EditorPreRenderImpl() ctor (reported by Nguyen Michael).
Fix SelectBoxState::onSetCursor() when the user is dragging a ruler.
Rename SelectTileState to SelectBoxState.
Now when an entry box in "Canvas Size" is modified, the rulers are moved.
Rename some variables in merge_zoomed_image() just to improve readability.

Improve "Canvas Size" command to show rulers to change the canvas size.
+ Added EditorDecorator and EditorState::getDecorator().
+ Added EditorPreRender and EditorPostRender classes.
+ Added Image::rectblend and image_rectblend functions to draw
  transparent rectangles.
+ Added SelectTileState and Ruler classes.

Add "default state" to the editor.
+ Converted to shared pointer (EditorStatePtr) the current/default state
  of the editor to simplify memory management of states.
Now "closewindow" attribute works for <button> widget when it isn't inside a window.
Modify Editor::drawGrid() to paint the grid inside the image's bounds.

Add Editor::changePreferredSettings() to fix problems with mini editor
changing the preferred document settings (scroll+zoom).
Add some checks in move_focus() for null pointers in gui/manager.cpp.

Refactor Editor class to use a state design pattern.
+ Added EditorState and derived classes (StandByState, DrawingState, etc.)
+ Added StatusBarListener.
Fix bug in Editor::drawMaskSafe() where mask in hidden editors were drawn.
Change default screen scale to 2x2 by default in all platforms.
Remove "using namespace tools;" from editor.cpp.
Add a note about IntEntry in TODO.txt.
Set minifont for "Edit Pal" button and convert it to check-box behavior.
Fix "i" glyph in minifont.
Change the title of mini-editor from "Preview" to "Mini-Editor".
Better support for different zoom levels in the mini-editor.
Add support to resize the pinned popup frames.
The mini-editor cannot be the current editor.

Add mini-editor to see 1px preview when you zoom in.
+ Added EditorView widget.
Add EditorListeners.
Rename ITabsHandler to TabsDelegate.
Remove JMessage and jmessage union, use Message* and Message instead.
Add minifont in SkinTheme for color buttons.
Move data/skins/default_skin to data/skins/default.
Use PNG for fonts instead of PCX.

Move everything related to tools in "tools" namespace.
+ Splitted tools/tool.h|cpp in several files (ink.h, intertwine.h, etc.).
Several fixes in font glyphs to improve the overall look of the program.
Add ToolLoopManager::Pointer abstraction to avoid using JMessage in src/tools/ dir.
Rename some Editor's member functions to camelCase.
Remove Editor's decorators (they were never used).

Add Widget::broadcastMouseMessage() to customize the list of targets
to receive mouse messages.

Remove UndoHistory::undo_* member functions to use Undoers directly
and to avoid undo-lib <-> undoers circular dependency.
Remove "typename" from get_neighboring_pixels() params.
Remove jwidget_find_name() function.
Replace jwidget_add_child/remove_child/replace_child with Widget's methods.
Add VBox, HBox, and BoxFiller micro-classes.

Add a "pin" in color selectors to make the popup window floating.
+ Added Frame::hitTest() and Frame::onHitTest().
+ Added LookType enum for SkinProperty.

Implement duplicate sprite with all layers (it was removed
temporally with the introduction of Document class).
Fix reversed logic in Document::duplicate().
Remove all public fields of Cel adding accessors.

Implement duplicate sprite with flatten layers (it was removed
temporally with the introduction of Document class).
Fix problems showing incorrect values in RGB/HSB entries in color selector.

Implement duplicate layer (it was removed temporally with the introduction
of Document class).
Show HSB instead of HSV in color selectors.

Fix showing layer buttons in the status-bar overlapped by the
transparent-color selector when we're moving pixels.
Fix bug #3050538 avoiding using the global "window_action" flag.
Remove NEWS.txt file (replaced with Wiki).
Use OVERRIDE macro in more member functions (onProcessMessage, etc.).

Replace UndoHistory::undo_int/data/double methods with new safe-undoers.
+ Added SetCelFrame/Opacity/Position, SetMaskPosition, SetStockImgType,
  and SetLayerFlags undoers.
+ Finally removed the Layer::flags_addr() atrocity.
+ Removed RawData undoer.
+ Renamed SetImgType to SetSpriteImgType.
Move src/widgets/editor.h to src/widgets/editor/editor.h.
Add ContextFlags to simplify Command::onEnabled() implementations.
Fix layer_editable and layer_locked parts (they were switched).
Improve Document::lock() with an enum as parameter instead of a bool.
Fix problems drawing the editor cursor when several JM_DRAWs messages were received.
Fix bug in ink_hline8_blur().
Fix bug in BlurGetPixelsDelegateIndexed::operator() in ink_processing.h.

Write-lock the Document only when we press OK button
in LayerProperties, CanvasSize, LoadMask, and SaveFile commands.
Remove LayerImage(const LayerImage*, Sprite*) ctor.
Fix UndoHistory to adjust m_diffCount correctly.
Minor changes in UndoTransaction to avoid throwing exceptions from its dtor.
Move FilterManagerImpl::apply() to private section.
Add a simple DeveloperConsole for debugging purposes (F11 key).

Mask and palettes do not need to be serialized with IDs because
they are not referenced by IDs in any other place.
Fix bug using incorrect states as the "saved one" in UndoHistory.

Fix bug #14, don't ask for saving changes when read-only commands are used.
+ Added a new attribute for each undo item (undo::Modification).
+ Each item now modifies or does not modify the document (e.g. selection
  actions do not modify the document).
+ Added an asterisk in tabs when the document is modified.

Improve AnimationEditor::drawCel() to avoid calling LayerImage::getCel()
for each Cel to be drawn (getCel() is O(N)).
Implement LayerImage::getCel() in terms of LayerImage::getCel() const.

Convert the animation editor to a C++ class (AnimationEditor derived
from Widget).

Fix bug in FilterManagerImpl::begin(), it was not checking the
new Document::isMaskVisible() flag.

Refactored the entire Undo system in several layers.
+ Added "undo" library (undo namespace).
+ Moved UndoHistory to undo namespace.
+ Added Undoer and UndoersCollector interfaces.
+ Converted old UndoStream to UndoersStack class.
+ Added new "undoers" namespace and moved each Undoer implementation
  (classes to undo different actions) to "undoers" directory.
+ Added IO operations to "raster" objects (image, cel, layer, palette,
  mask).
Use <iosfwd> instead of <iostream> in base/serialization.h.
Add OVERRIDE macro as wrapper for MSVC "override" keyword.
Fix definition of read8/write8 in base::serialization namespace.
Use C99 uint*_t instead of ase_uint*.

Add ObjectsContainer interface in src/undo/ so UndoHistory has a way to
obtain any kind of objects (not just GfxObj).
+ Removed GfxObjId.
+ Added ObjectsContainerImpl.
+ Use UniquePtr for each member in Document to avoid memory leaks in
  Document() ctor.
+ Removed RasterModule class.
UndoTransaction does not need document wrappers.
Rename Layer::destroy_all_cels() to destroyAllCels().
Minor fixes to #include directives in raster/ dir.

No more pimpl idiom for Sprite class (because the biggest dependencies
are now part of Document class).
Remove deprecated file cmd_new_cel.cpp.
Move UndoHistory from raster/ to undo/ directory.

Modify PixelsMovementImpl to avoid write-locking the document
in the whole operation.
Changes in TODO file.
Rename DocumentWriter::unlock_writter() to unlockWriter().

Move the active mask from Sprite class to Document.
+ Removed masks and paths repositories.
+ Added Document::isMaskVisible and Document::setMaskVisible methods.
Fix warning abouts undefined dtor of FormatOptions in file_formats_manager.cpp.
Rename Undoable to UndoTransaction.

Add Document class, to remove app specific properties from Sprite.
+ Moved some properties from Sprite to Document: lock/unlock/mutex,
  filename, isModified flag, undo history, mask boundaries, file
  format options, preferred editor settings, extra cel.
+ A Context now has an active document (instead of an active sprite).
+ Renamed all sprite wrappers to be document wrappers (as the mutex is
  in the Document now).
+ Modifications to SharedPtr<> to be more like C++0x shared_ptr<>.
Add reset(pointer,deleter_type) member function to UniquePtr.
Remove deprecated vectmap code.

Add find_unittests() in src/CMakeLists.txt to avoid compiling unittests
with all libraries as dependencies.
Add UniquePtr class.
Convert Documents from std::list<> to a class.
Renamed SpriteList to Documents.
Rename Undo class to UndoHistory.
Add explicit to CurrentSprite/Reader/Writer(Context*).

Refactor filters (effects).
+ Added Filter, FilterManager, and FilterIndexedData interfaces.
+ Moved all widgets related to filters to src/commands/filters.
+ Added the filters library.
+ Added FilterWindow and one derived window for each filter.
Add <colorpicker> element for XML widgets.
Console::showException() does not modify the exception (added "const").
Minor changes in gui.cpp.
Use Widget::layout() instead of Widget::setBounds(getBounds).

Fix bug of hidden widgets when the frame is shown.
This is (probably) a fix for bug #3050538 in sf.net tracker.
Remove unreferenced local variable warning.
Move jwidget_relayout() to Widget::layout().
Adjustments to TODO.txt file.
Remove gui/base.h from sprite.cpp

Add SpriteReader wrapper to lock the sprite when Editor paints it.
+ Fixed critical bugs using "sprite resize" command and drawing
  the current editor (fixed usage of invalid memory pointers).
  It happens because the resize command is executed in a background
  thread, and at the same time the user can cancel or move a progress
  dialog (generating redraw events to the editor).
+ Anyway this change incorporates some other problems with effects
  where they keep locked the sprite in the whole command execution,
  so the effect preview cannot be visualized. This will be fixed with
  a refactor of the entire effect/preview stuff.
Fix problems restoring preferred scroll in selected sprite.
Minor changes: comments to C++ style.
Fix compiling on Linux when XDGA is detected (fixed issue #12).

Replace old gfx-data with graphics from the skin sheet.
+ Removed gfxdata.cpp file.
+ Removed get_gfx() from modules/gfx.h/cpp.
+ Added skin parts for each removed graphics of gfxdata.
+ Added IButtonIcon interface and an implementation for skin theme.
+ Removed "icon_buttons" from gui.cpp.
+ Now icons in button are set through set_gfxicon_to_button function.
+ Removed from Theme class check/radio_icon_size member variables
  (they are replaced with the new IButtonIcon interface).
+ Removed jdraw_inverted_sprite(), now each icon has it normal/selected
  version in the skin sheet.
Rewritten palette editor using ColorSliders and HexColorEntry widgets.

Add ColorSlidersChangeEvent so ColorSliders::ColorChange signal
can receive the modified channel.

Rewrite the entire color selector as C++ class.
+ Added ColorSliders widget for RGB, HSV, and Grayscale sliders.
+ Added HexColorEntry to show a color in HTML format.
Avoid sending keys to gui manager when a popup frame is visible.
Add degree symbol in string representation of HSV colors.
Fix critical bug using "thumbnails" dead-pointer after calling "destroy_thumbnails".

Fix issue #8: saving .gif files with transparent backgrounds
does not clear the previous frame.
Add Slider::getMinValue and getMaxValue.

New color-bar with scrollable palette-view.
+ Removed palette-view from Palette Editor.
+ Fixed problems pasting RGB values in #hex format and HSV sliders.
Include system.h because we need JI_CURSORS in skin_theme.h.
Add Border(int) constructor.
Change SIGNAL_COLORBUTTON_CHANGE to ColorButton::Change signal.
Change drawing code of ColorButton from JM_DRAW to onPaint().
Modify short color format in Color::toFormalString().
Remove deprecated colorviewer widget.
Refactor the entire view widget to View, Viewport, and ScrollBar C++ classes.
Add some operators+(Border) to Border class and Border::getSize() member function.
Add support for vertical-scrolling with mouse wheel in PaletteView widget.
Remove quick-menu stuff (used only in old jinete examples):
Add text-color to Label widget.
Include new src/gui/*.h header files in src/gui/gui.h.
Remove COLOR_SIZE macro in palette_view.cpp.
Add PaletteView::IndexChange signal (to replace SIGNAL_PALETTE_EDITOR_CHANGE).
Change "images" variable in ji_move_region() from JList to std::vector.
Change "thumbnails" variable in src/util/thmbnail.cpp from JList to std::vector<> type.
Change StatusBar::m_progress from JList to std::vector<> type.
Add shortcut in the tool-tip of ToolBar.
Fix position of tool tip in tool-bar.
Fix problem painting a new tip window (with alpha) over a dirty (non-validated) area in tool-bar.
Add ArrowAlign to TipWindow so the tip is pointing to some widget.
Move jwidget_init_theme() to Widget::initTheme().

Add Them::paintTooltip and changed the tooltip skin with rounded borders and shadow.
+ Move all parts definition to src/skin_parts.h.

Use Graphics pointer in PopupFrame/TipWindow::onPreferredSize/onPaint events.
+ Add Graphics::drawString/fitString/drawStringAlgorithm.
Setup the widget's font in Graphics created for PaintEvents.
Add ScreenGraphics to get a "Graphics" to draw directly onto the screen.

Change painting code of some widgets from JM_DRAW to onPaint().
This need future work to avoid using ji_screen and access to the
drawable area only through Graphics pointer inside the PaintEvent.

Add Widget::setDoubleBuffered(bool) to use double-buffering method
automatically when ji_screen == real screen. Activate this attribute
for palette editor sliders.

Change Slider paint code from JM_DRAW message handler to onPaint() method.
+ Rename Theme::draw_slider -> paintSlider(PaintEvent&)
+ Add methods in Graphics to draw images, rectangles, and text.
+ Add IntersectClip class.
+ Add Widget::getClientBounds().
+ Modify ISliderBgPainter::paint to receive a Graphics instead of BITMAP.
+ Add more methods in SkinTheme to draw theme parts in Graphics.
Add an item in TODO.txt about lack of feedback with Shift+S keyboard shortcut.
Fix problem with PaletteEditor "switch" parameter in menu item "View > Palette Editor" command.
Minor changes in font.h (format).
Overload gfx::Border class operators to increment/decrement border size.
Sort #include lines in gui.h.
Add unit tests for gfx::Rect class.
Rename Rect::inflate() -> enlarge() and Rect::deflate -> shrink().
Remove "j" prefix from some files in gui library.
Fix "discards const qualifier" gcc warning.
Fix gcc warning about incompatible memcpy implicit declaration.
Avoid deprecated allegro functions.
Fix gcc warning about incompatible implicit malloc() definition.
Fix error in if() expression in giflib/CMakeLists.txt.
Rename PalEdit to PaletteView widget to avoid confusion with the palette editor command.
Replace draw_bounds_template() macro with SkinTheme::draw_bounds_template member function.
Add Widget::get/setBorder().
Add gfx::Border class.
Minor change in event.h.
Add PaintEvent and Graphics (future replacement of JM_DRAW message).
Minor changes in jintern.h
Convert jalert to Alert C++ class.
Move src/gui/jalert.h to src/gui/alert.h.
Refactor jimage widget to ImageView C++ class.
Convert jgrid widget to C++ Grid class (avoid reallocs, use std::vector for internals instead).
Convert jbox widget to Box class.
Rename src/gui/jview to src/gui/view.

Improve palette editor's RGB/HSV sliders.
+ Added SkinSliderProperty and ISliderBgPainter to draw a customized background in sliders.
+ Moved SkinTheme to src/skin/ directory.
Open new sprites in the center of the current sprite.
Convert "list" collection in "move_focus" function to std::vector.
Convert "timers" collection to std::vector (to avoid using a raw array of pointers).

Move "Constant Frame Rate" as a menu option under "Frame" menu (before it was a button in "Sprite Properties" dialog).
+ Added "frame" parameter to FrameProperties command.
+ Removed the global function dialogs_frame_length().
Add support to load only the first frame of the animation (used in file selector's preview).
Move jmalloc/jfree to base/ library as base_malloc/free (remove new/new0/renew macros).
Avoid memory leaks from GuiXml singleton.
Update tasks for next release in TODO.txt.
Rename PopupWindow to PopupFrame.
Remove jwidget_close_window function.
Remove jwidget_send_message.
Replace jwidget_dirty/invalidate and Widget::dirty functions with new Widget::invalidate* member functions.
Remove jwidget_get_parent/manager/parents/children/pick/has_child functions.
Replace jwidget_get/set_theme with Widget::get/setTheme.

Remove jtheme and JTheme types, use Theme class directly.
+ Added CurrentTheme namespace.
+ Rename Theme::regen() to Theme::onRegenerate().
+ ji_regen_theme() is in Theme::regenerate() member function.
Move SkinneableTheme in src/modules/ directory to SkinTheme in src/.
Remove standard theme from gui/ directory (old ASE 0.7.2 look).
Move pen_type.h to raster directory.

Move "AseException" to "base::Exception" class.
+ Created XmlException for tinyxml parsing errors.
+ Moved functionality of AseException::show() to Console::showException().
Rename CommandsModule::get_command_by_name to getCommandByName.
Rename all commands to camel case.
Move CommandFactory class from command.h to command_factory.h.
Refactor all member functions of Context class to camel case.
More updates for copyright year to 2011.
Rename ase_exception to AseException.
Add _WIN32_WINNT definitions to avoid compilations errors with VS2005 (undefined Win32 API symbols).
Add transparent color index in sprite and .ase files (it does not work in render operation yet).
Minor change: Remove one #include from render.cpp.
Update copyright year to 2011.

Use giflib to load gif files.
With this changes a lot of bugs loading different kind of .gif
files are fixed. GIF files must be loaded as RGBA images to
support background color and different transparent color per
frame combinations.
Use a SharedPtr to delete automatically the optimized palette in fop_operate().

Avoid to create an optimized palette for RGB images if the same loading process creates one.
+ Added Palette:isBlack member function.
Fix bug in SpriteImpl::resetPalettes() using an invalid "end" iterator after erasing an element from the m_palettes collection.
Fix color_utils::color_for_image() when the color is of index type and the imgtype is indexed.
Minor changes in CelPropertiesCommand (remove buf[] local variable using Widget::setTextf).
Convert FileFormat to a C++ class.
Do not open sub-menus when timer elapsed and we are already opening or closing a menu (base->is_processing).
Add CMakeLists.txt and config.h.cmake for giflib.
Add "Deleter" template parameter to SharedPtr<> class to customize the destruction of T pointer.
Remove VACA_DIR variable from main CMakeLists.txt file.
Remove unnecessary files from giflib directory.
Add giflib 4.1.6 third party source code.
Fix loading of GIF files with transparent background color (without global palette).
Fix convert_imgtype from Indexed to RGB when the first palette entry is not black (is not transparent color).

Add accurate color quantization or use median cut if the sprite has more than 256 colors.
+ Implemented issue #3 - Accurate Sprite Quantize.
+ Remove Ben Davis code to quantize color palette (to avoid license problems).
Fix Palette:countDiff() bug when "to" must be equal to max-1.
Add support for 8-bit transparent PNG sprites (fixed issue #5).
Show current sprite's filename in window title bar.
Remove unnecessaries #include <allegro/...> in raster/.
Replace images_ref functions (src/effect) with ImagesCollector class (src/raster).
Move functions related to quantization and dithering algorithms to raster/quantization.h|cpp.
Fix Quantize command call (sprite was locked).
Remove duplicated getters in sprite (const/non-const).
Fix a subtle problem in close_menuitem() setting the "is_processing" flag when it is not the last one in the chain (e.g. when it is followed by a JM_OPEN_MENUITEM message).
Modify sys_directx_assert() to call DebugBreak() instead of abort().
Changes in keyboard shortcuts to avoid tool-switching confusion.
Update NEWS.txt with changes in 0.8.2 release (0.8 branch).
Include third_party/gtest/include as -I only one time.
Fix HSV unittests.
Fix bug in Hsv::saturationInt().
New "overlap" trace-policy for tools like Spray, Blur, and Jumble.

Fix problems resizing the window on Windows.
+ Limit the minimum window size to 192x96.
+ Only accept multiples of 16 for width and height.
Fix null pointer reference for tools without icons in StatusBar::onProcessMessage.
Fix problems loading .ico files with color_count=0, and images with pixels out of range.
Fix bug using uninitialized prev_x and prev_y values in Editor::editor_click.
Fix memory leak (one Palette object) in .ico image loader.
Fix problems compiling unittests with a Visual Studio solution.
Replace "tests/test.h" to <gtest/gtest.h> (as various unittests are for independent libraries).
Include <iterator> in path.cpp, because it uses std::back_inserter.
Convert jentry to Entry class.
Remove all deprecated jinete and raster samples.
Rename src/gui/jentry.cpp,h to src/gui/entry.cpp,h.
Trigger Slider::SliderReleased signal on JM_BUTTONRELEASED message.
Rename Slider::slider_setcursor to setupSliderCursor.
Periodical update to TODO.txt file.
Fix hsv_unittests using floor() in hueInt/saturationInt/valueInt.

Use gfx::Rgb and gfx::Hsv classes for HSV <-> RGB conversions.
+ Removed rgb_to_hsv_int() and hsv_to_rgb_int() functions.
+ Changed HSV ranges from [0,255] to H=[0,360], S=[0,100], V=[0,100].
+ Simplified Color class (src/app/color.h) using a m_type and m_value union.
Add Hsv and Rgb classes to gfx-lib.
Remove blend modes from ImageLayers.

Convert jslider to Slider class.
+ Changed JI_SIGNAL_SLIDER_CHANGE to Slider::Change signal.
Add Widget::findChildT<>() member function.
Rename src/gui/jslider.h to src/gui/slider.h.
Remove obj/ directory, it's not used anymore with the new CMake build system.

Fix problems drawing widgets when a key is pressed outside the main frame/window.
This bug was introduced with the drawing optimization in commit fb0e82be084771ff33e926b5873df8fef7341a1e.
Improve RGB and HSV modifications when a range of colors is selected in the palette.

Add undo support for palette changes.
+ Added Undo::undo_set_palette_colors() method.
Update version to ASE 0.9 in master branch.
Fix a issue with Editor's slots: when an Editor is destroyed, we have to remove all slots from signals.
signal.h needs remove_from_container.h.
Minor changes in jmenu.cpp/h (JWidget -> Widget*, etc.)
Add serialization.cpp to base lib.
Fix base/thread.h header guard name.
Add support for 7za.exe in dist.sh.
Remove path_new/free functions.
Replace Path's name from char* to std::string.
Pen now uses a std::vector<PenScanline> instead of a raw pointer to PenScanline[] array.
More priority for GUI thread, it is necessary for better GUI response in presence of background threads (this change was removed in commit 21957f21642a98422612bc1b268b20c7377f0eff).
Save the mask_color field in the undo raw image data.
Copy the mask_color in image_crop() function.
Fix ToolLoopImpl() to clear with mask_color the image used to draw.
Modify FileOp structure to use std::string and std::vector<> instead of raw pointers and JList.
Remove deps.sh as now dependencies are handled by CMake build system.
Remove references to Vaca namespace and old vaca source files.
Remove unused local variable in init_directx_window().
Return 0 when WM_MOUSEMOVE is processed.
Use CreateThread instead of _beginthread() to create the wnd_thread_proc.
Change Win32 window class name to "ASEWindowClass".
Remove related stuff for non-background switch mode (in Allegro source code for Win32).
Return true when a key is used to select a tool.
As now the window can be resized in all platforms we can remove "Configure Screen" option.
Keep only DirectX Windowed driver (no fullscreen and no GDI).

Fix a bug when calling Editor::editor_set_sprite(NULL).
The editor_clean_cursor() function is called from
editor_set_scroll() when no sprite is selected.
Add asserts to _al_win_kbd_handle* functions().
Minor changes in jmessage to debug JM_KEYPRESSED/RELEASED messages.

Fix windows keyboard handling when ToUnicode fails.
Introduced in the cumbersome commit 27ba60479762c2582868bd41a135b00cb18bc2e7.
Remove Allegro customization functions for HWND in Windows port.
Fix memory leaks (old "screen" bitmap) when resizing the window.
Add information about patches for resize support in Allegro source code.
Add resize support to Mac OS X port.
Move "-arch i386" flag for Apple port in main CMakeLists.txt file.
Remove config.cpp because the config.c in src/allegro already has my patch for override_config_file().
Add resize support for X11 port.

Add resize support to Allegro library (Windows port is ready).
+ Add acknowledge_resize() function.
+ Add set_resize_callback() function and RESIZE_DISPLAY_EVENT structure.
Use set_close_button_callback instead of set_window_close_hook (which is deprecated).
Use _keyboard_installed and _mouse_installed flags to trigger keyboard and mouse events in directx_wnd_proc().
Do not process keyboard shortcuts (e.g. tools shortcuts) when a foreground window is on top.

Fix call to ToUnicode() in _al_win_kbd_handle_key_press().
This bug was introduced in commit f09318ffa7010dbc9800882cef16539f370382b6.
Add customizable quicktools keyboard shortcuts to the editor (feature requested by Paul Pridham).
Add GuiXml class to avoid duplicated code and loading gui.xml file several times.
Add Editor::getCurrentEditorTool() function.
Add destroy_default_font() to avoid memory leak of the default font.
Fix memory leak in StatusBar::onProcessMessage().
Add jmouse_release/capture functions.
Fix a problem using uninitialized values (scroll_x/y) in jview (detected with valgrind).
Fix possible bug in tok_fgets() processing an empty line.
Minor style changes.
Fix dirty for RGB and grayscale images (bug introduced in commit 4c5a0177ccb07c088c5a26bb748b32c9800c716d).

Do not update key_shifts flags anymore in Windows.
Update modifiers in key[] array using GetAsyncKeyState() instead of GetKeyboardState().
Move _al_win_* functs to aintwin.h.
Move PAINTSTRUCT to WM_PAINT only.
Add "Alt" possibility for keyboard shortcuts in gui.xml.
Do not use key_shifts anymore.
Remove dependency with DirectInput and delete winput.c file.
Modify Allegro to use WM_KEYUP/DOWN messages instead of DirectInput.
Modify Allegro to use WM_MOUSEMOVE instead of DirectInput in the Windows mouse driver.
Remove FindDSound. Update FindDxxx.cmake files to use DXSDK_DIR variable (as in Allegro 5).
Remove sound/digi/midi/sample related stuff from Allegro code.
Remove src/allegro/src/linux code.
Remove unused files from src/allegro/misc/.
Remove ASM code from Allegro source.
Remove PSP and BeOS configuration from the main CMakeLists.txt
Fix compilation errors with gcc in Mac OS X (void* <-> int conversions).
Remove thread::id type (to avoid using pthread_t as an unsigned int, which is an opaque pointer really).
Remove joystick stuff from Allegro source code.
Remove Allegro GUI related stuff.
Remove PSP specific lines in Common.cmake.
Add some notes in INSTALL.txt about the supported platforms/compilers.
Remove DOS/BeOS/djgpp/QNX/BCC32/Watcom/DMC/PSP stuff from Allegro source code.
Remove fixes for rc compiler in MinGW.

Move link flags and other cmake configuration from Allegro's CMakeLists.txt to the main CMakeLists.txt.
Remove all the "modules" stuff from Allegro's CMakeLists.txt
Remove VACA_ALLEGRO definition.
Add "allegro" library as part of the ASE build process.
Add Allegro source code (branch 4.4, svn revision 13829).
Simple fix to improve performance in Linux with pixel scaling > x1.
Add JI_DIRTY flag to optimize jwidget_flush_redraw().
Remove old makefiles.
Add "install" target so we can use "make install" on Linux.
Remove DEFAULT_PREFIX variable (on Linux resources are searched in ../share now).

Removed from README.html instructions about how to compile ASE.
The new instructions are in INSTALL.txt and this file should not be distributed with ASE binary releases.
Minor change in SkinneableTheme::reload_skin().
Do not center the mouse pointer when zoom (Paul Pridham idea).
Remove linking two times aseprite-library in aseprite target.
Avoid asserting leak of GfxObjs when MEMLEAK is defined.
Temporarily commented the SpriteReader in editor's JM_DRAW because "Preview" does not work with it.

Convert Dirty to a class.
Remove all deprecated code of Dirty class that was not being used because the new ASE 0.8 tools implementation.
Remove pointers to an Image/Mask from Dirty class.
Remove algo_dirty() and old 00dirty.cpp test/example.
Add imgtype_shift() and imgtype_line_size().
Call sheet_mapping.clear() in ~SkinneableTheme() to avoid false memory leaks.
Move GfxObjId type to gfxobj_id.h file.
Lock the editor's sprite to draw it in JM_DARW message.
Use replaceStockImage() in Undoable::setImgType() to avoid duplicated code.
Show SymGetLineFromAddr() information whatever is the SymFromAddr() result.
Fix __builtin_return_address() for MSVC (problems accessing to the address pointed by eax when it is too small).
Fix huge problems using "headslot" in multiple threads.
Add ENABLE_MEMLEAK parameter to CMakeLists.txt (fix jmem.cpp so it can be compiled when MEMLEAK is defined).
Add Dirty::getMemSize() method.
Add a comment in Undo::updateUndo() about the usage of get_config_int() function.
Remove unnecessary #include <string.h> in undo.h

Add virtual method getMemSize() to GfxObj class (overriden by Image, Cel, Layer, etc.).
These methods will be used for a new implementation of Undo.
Remove "state" arg from UndoAction::invert() function.
Convert UndoStream in a class.
Rename undo_exception to UndoException.
Modify jnew(FileOp) with "new FileOp".
Fix bug introduced in commit e885fcd3a187b090303464215be97b443491d564: leave one palette after Sprite::resetPalettes().
Add return statement to thread::id::operator=().
Fix pthread implementation of base::thread class (problems joining threads, initializing m_id field, etc.).
Move thread class to base lib (the new thread class has a C++0x-like api).
Fix order of libraries so we can link loadpng with alleg library with gcc on Windows.
Fix error passing base::string in sprintf() like routine.
Rename src/gui/jwidget.cpp|h to src/gui/widget.cpp|h.
Rename src/gui/jlabel.cpp|h to src/gui/label.cpp|h.
Rename src/gui/jbutton.cpp|h to src/gui/button.cpp|h.
Rename src/gui/jwindow.cpp|h to src/gui/frame.cpp|h.
Add resources_win32.rc in aseprite target on Windows.
Move all undo_*() functions as members of Undo class.
Refactor Stock class to contains methods instead of stock_*() functions.
Remove JList from UndoStream class.
Remove JLists from Sprite class.
Fix config.h when MEMLEAK is defined (jinete/jbase.h was moved to gui/jbase.h).
Simplify usage of allegro_c_flags setting CMAKE_C_FLAGS variable.
Add some comments in src/CMakeLists.txt file.
Add support to link ASE with the shared versions of libjpeg, libpng, and zlib.
Fix compilation errors with gcc in shared_ptr_unittest.cpp.
Fix compilation errors copying SharedPtr<> of different types in gcc.
Fix compilation problems in core/file_system.cpp (in Unix like platforms).
Include correct header files (gcc compiler detects these kind of problems).
Fix code in src/CMakeLists.txt to check return value of allegro-config.
Remove jstring class replacing it with the new base::string and new functions to manipulate strings.
Remove WIN32 attribute for tests (so we can see colored output in win cmd console).

Add INSTALL.txt to know how to compile ASE with CMake (the new build system).
This file should not be distributed in the .exe releases (only with source code).
Remove Vaca source code completely (replace NonCopyable class with DISABLE_COPYING macro).

Move Vaca classes to base and gui libraries.
+ Remove Vaca::Referenceable class and move Vaca::SharedPtr<> to base/shared_ptr.h (now shared pointers can point to any type).
+ Move Vaca::Component/Event/Property/PreferredSizeEvent to gui/component.cpp.
Force DISABLE_COPYING() to be in private: class section.
Remove Vaca::Application class. Move Vaca::String class to src/base/string.h (and split_string and convert_to algorithms to src/base/).
Now the gui-lib is another package compiled with its own CMakeLists.txt.
Fix typo in gfx/point.cpp.
Add allegro-config calls to compile ASE on Linux.
USE_STATIC_ALLEGRO is off by default.
Add dirExists() member function in FileSystemModule.
Fix mem_utils.cpp compilation error with gcc.
Move Jinete library to src/gui directory (future gui-lib).
Remove old C hash implementation.
Move Signal/Slot/Bind stuff to base-lib.
Move Point/Size/Rect classes to a new gfx-lib.
Move Mutex class from Vaca to src/base.
Remove Debug.cpp/h from Vaca source code.
Modify get_pretty_memory_size() to return a std::string.
Separate "base" code under terms of the BSD license.
Fixed an old typo in the BSD license.
Refactor undo_clear_redo/set_label/get_next_*_label -> Undo::clearRedo/etc.
Remove PRINTF() usage in raster/undo.cpp (so raster does not depends on LoggerModule).
Refactor undo_do_undo/redo -> Undo::doUndo/Redo.
Refactor undo_can_undo/redo to Undo::canUndo/Redo.
Remove undo_new/free/enable/disable/is_enabled/is_disabled, add Undo::is/setEnabled.
Remove dependency to modules/palettes.h in sprite.cpp.
Add needed forward declaration of Palette in undo.h
Camel-case for Undoable class.
Refactor Layer::add/remove/get_cel to add/remove/getCel.
Refactor Layer::configure_as_background -> configureAsBackground().
Refactor Layer::get_cel_begin/end to getCelBegin/End, and get_cels to getCels.
Refactor Layer::get/set_name to Layer::get/setName.
Rename "fuzziness" to "tolerance" in maskcol.cpp file.

Remove internationalization stuff.
- Remove "_" macro.
- Remove src/intl/ directory.
Remove user_printf() function.

Modify GfxObj class to keep its members private. Public members come from old C code where "GfxObj"s were "struct"s.
- Add GfxObj::getId and GfxObj::getType.
- GfxObj type enumeration now is called GfxObjType.
Remove dead code in dirty.cpp.
Rename member functions of Job class.
Rename App::get_toolbox() to App::getToolBox().

Remove core/core.h-cpp.
- App class contains the running mode (isGui() flag).
- LoggerModule contains the verbose flag.
- Remove is_interactive().
Fix comment in config.h about verbose_printf() location.
Remove util/rectscr.cpp (as 8bpp is not supported, we cannot record the screen in FLI format anymore).
Modify app/color.h header guard prefix from CORE_ to APP_.
Add BASE_ prefix in mem_utils.h header guards.
Move LoggerModule to log.cpp.
Move get_errno_string() to src/base/errno_string.
Move "src/core/job.[ch]" to src/job.[ch].
Remove "static" member functions from RecentFiles. Now App has a RecentFiles member and it must be accessed through the App singleton.
Remove jexception, leave ase_exception only.
Move mem_utils.cpp in base/ directory.
Add some comments to GfxMode / CurrentGfxModeGuard.
Minor change (move location of GLOB_RECURSE defition in src/CMakeLists.txt)
Remove file_system test.
Add jstring_unittest.cpp.
Move tests/test_jgrid.cpp to jinete/jgrid_unittest.cpp.
Move tests/test_jlist.cpp to jinete/jlist_unittest.cpp.
Fix test.h for GUI tests. Jinete class instance is needed.
Fix bug #3051174 (reported by Trent Gamblin): Loading two or more times gui.xml file.
Add custom targets in CMakeLists to run unit-tests.
Move src/tests/test_errno.cpp to src/errno_unittest.cpp.
Include jinete/jinete.h for GUI tests.
Use GLOB_RECURSE instead of GLOB to get all *_unittest.cpp files from the src/ directory.

Default option is to use Allegro lib statically.
It is the only option which is working with cmake at the moment.
Add rule to compile _unittest.cpp files.
Add aseprite-library (this library will be used for unit tests, is all aseprite code without the main() routine defined).
Modify tests/test.h to use gtest.
Move common definitions in cflags to the main CMakeLists.txt file.
Add -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS to third party code so we don't get warnings about "insecure" C functions with MSVC compiler.
Move src/tests/test_color.cpp to src/app/color_unittest.cpp.
Add gtest source code.
Add rules to compile tests with MSVC.

Convert color_t type to Color class.
+ Add color_utils namespace and move useful routines for colors right there.
+ Add test_color.cpp.
Rename colbut.h to color_button.h.
Rename colsel.h to color_selector.h.
Rename colbar.h to color_bar.h.
Remove old unused graphics.
Move jinete/jfile.cpp to xml_widgets.cpp.
Added an assert in debug mode to check duplicate FileItems in file_system module.

Convert jbutton widget to ButtonBase, Button, CheckBox, and RadioButton C++ classes.
+ Add ButtonBase::Click signal.
+ Button does not close the window by default (you have to configure this action manually when Click signal is triggered).
+ Add "closewindow" attribute to <button> widget in XML files.
+ Move "bevels" to SkinProperty.
+ Convert colorbutton widget in ColorButton C++ class.
"Layer > Duplicate" menu item does not need "..." because it does not ask the layer name to the user.
Remove jfilesel.[ch] file.
Fix "paste" command when we paste in an empty spot (layer/frame without a created cel).
Added some asserts to check Editor::m_pixelsMovement.
New version 0.8.2 in progress.
Minor fix in NEWS.

Fix background color when we render indexed images.
To render an indexed image we start with color 0 (RGBA) only if there is not a background layer, in other case, when the background exists we clear with the first palette color entry (index=0).
This patch fix commit 3ea39bb211bee41c737c54a036b565411fb24300.
Patch contributed by Trent Gamblin to compile ASE with Mac OS X.
Make "Tools Configuration" dialog wider when it is needed.
News for ASE 0.8.1.
Show/hide opacity and tolerance parameters depending if the current tool supports these.
Spray settings are hidden when we do not have the Spray tool selected.
Rename "fuzziness" parameter to "tolerance" in Replace Color effect (to keep consistency with the new floodfill tolerance parameter).
Update version to 0.8.1.
Add "Tolerance" parameter for some tools like Magic Wand and Paint Bucket (Trent Gamblin idea).
Fixed RenderEngine::renderSprite() for indexed images with a non-black color in index=0.
Fix bug with onion skinning for frame=0 and frame=frames-1.
Fix compilation flags for VC (release without debug info).

Move keyboard shortcuts to change pen size from Editor widget to commands.
* Now +/- keys are configurable because they are defined in gui.xml as calls to the new "change_pen" command.
Enable eye-dropper in color-button widget when we drag & drop the mouse button.
When we are in pixels-movement loop, drop pixels when the user selects other tool (that is not marquee, lasso, or magic wand).
Move get_shift_from_mask() to clipboard_win32 because this function is used for Windows clipboard.
Changes in TODO.txt.
Fix warnings in GCC (unused variables, size_t and int comparisons, unhandled enum cases in switch, etc.).
Fix FileItem::insert_child_sorted call in Linux (now it is insertChildSorted()).
Added error message in Launcher if it fails.
Add timer to menu items to show the sub-menu with some delay.
Modify comments in jmenu.cpp to C++ style.
When the editor's current sprite is set we have to drop the pixels (if the user is moving pixels).

Add button in status bar to change the transparent color of pixels in movement in the current editor.
* Add Editor::setMaskColorForPixelsMovement() method.
* EDITOR_STATE_MOVING_PIXELS is not a particular state because we can move scroll while we are moving pixels.
* Rename EDITOR_STATE_MOVING_SCROLL to EDITOR_STATE_SCROLLING.
* Add StatusBar::show/hideMovePixelsOptions and StatusBar::getTransparentColor().
Add PixelsMovement::setMaskColor() method to change the mask color of the pixels in movement.
Mask color is used in all routines that draw an image (Indexed, RGB, Grayscale).
Do not use app_get_statusbar() inside StatusBar::onProcessMessage().
Rename StatusBar::m_commands_box to m_commandsBox.
Minor changes in statebar.cpp/h comments.
Fix selection tools when the cel is in x<0 and/or y<0.
Update NEWS file.

Fix problem in Widget::getPreferredSize() introduced in commit 01c811e7266cbd5abc8f452b3529007a59dac271.
Min/max sizes are taken into account when getPreferredSize() calls a customized onPreferredSize() method.
Move functions to access file system items (FileItem) in a new IFileItem interface.
Fix problems generating a key for a directory which contains a file that has the same name as the directory (e.g. C:\file.png\file.png).
Add more PRINTF() in file_system.cpp to debug problems with PIDLs.
Fix images_ref.cpp location in source tree.
Add CMakeLists.txt files.
Remove warnings about size_t and int comparisons.
Use Allegro's ASSERT() instead of assert().
Change Palette class size() from size_t to int type (to avoid all kind of problems using "unsigned int" type).
Remove warnings about int and size_t comparisons.
Remove unused local variable in draw_color() function.

Add PreferredSizeEvent and Widget::onPreferredSize to replace JM_REQSIZE message.
There are a lot of widgets in C code, so JM_REQSIZE cannot be removed until all widgets are converted to C++ classes.
Rename Widget::msg_proc to Widget::onProcessMessage.
Change layer numbers (0, 1, 2, ...) with letters (A, B, C, ...) in status-bar.
Minor aesthetic modifications to state-bar.

Add "palette" argument in RenderEngine::renderImage method and BlenderHelper<> ctor.
With this change we can show two editors with two different sprites with two different palettes at the same time.
Added "Editor::State" name to anonymous enum in Editor class.
Re-estructured menu: "Edit > Options", "Edit > Tools", and "View > Screen".
Removed "record_screen" command.
Fixed minor problem with background color in Tabs widget's buttons.
Renamed locked_sprite_exception to LockedSpriteException.

Refactored Command class to contain extensions points (virtual methods) as protected members (except clone() method).
+ Renamed Command::load_params -> onLoadParams
+ Renamed Command::enabled -> onEnabled
+ Renamed Command::checked -> onChecked
+ Renamed Command::execute -> onExecute
+ Added public (non-virtual methods) Command::execute/loadParams/isChecked/isEnabled.
Eliminated a warning in MSVC about double -> float convertion.
Modified "error" by "problem" in exceptions.
Tabs widget is double buffered now.
Added BITMAP argument in jdraw_text() function.
Modified some cursors in skin sheet.
Fixed file description in .rc file.
Added width and height arguments to ji_set_screen() function.
Added possibility to copy the selected pixels with CTRL key.
Modified "arrow with plus sign" cursor.
Disabled some options that will not be available yet in the next beta.
Added executable bit to fix.sh.
Fixed warning about probably uninitialized variables.
Fixed compilation errors in gcc 3.4.
Minor changes in README.html about compilation, make, and paths.
Fixed typo in NEWS.txt.
Avoid some compilation warnings and errors with gcc on linux.
Added support for DESTDIR on Unix-like systems (patch #3032942).
Added animations to Tabs widget when adding and removing tabs, and scrolling with mouse wheel.
Added Tabs::calcTabWidth() method to replace CALC_TAB_WIDTH macro.

Removed JI_SIGNAL_REMOVE_CHILD and JI_SIGNAL_NEW_PARENT.
These signals do not make sense when we are removing a widget that is being destroyed.
Renamed icon.rc to resources_win32.rc, and added VERSIONINFO resource.

Removed "Tools" menu item.
- "FX" menu is now inside "Edit" menu.
- All other options now are inside "View".
Removed "Cel" item from the menu bar.
Added more resolutions for "Configure Screen" command.
Modified some comments from C style to C++.
Added some screenshots to the manual.
Added documentation about scrolling with mouse wheel.
Added documentation about "Preview" command.
Minor improvement to BlenderHelper<RgbTraits, IndexedTraits> saving the current palette as member.

Merged all preview commands (fit screen/tiled/normal) to just one Preview command (F8).
- Improved preview to show checked background as default background for transparent sprites.
- Added RenderEngine::renderImage() and renderCheckedBackground().
- Removed F6 and F7 shortcuts.
Minor changes in comments.
Added ISettings::getOnionskinOpacityBase/Step() methods.
Removed usage of color_map in ImageImpl<IndexedTraits>::merge() function.
Added support for onionskin with multiple frames.
Implemented onionskin stuff in UISettingsImpl class.

Modified render method to use a RGB image for the final result (independently of the current image type).
With this we can draw the background grid (and use onionskin) in indexed images without palette limitations.
Minor change: Modified C comments to C++.
Moved check_args.cpp from src/core/ to src/.
Replaced old DIRS structure with ResourceFinder class.
Minor reorder of files in makefile.lst.
Removed LoadPalette() function.
Moved get_pretty_memsize (core.h) to get_pretty_memory_size (mem_utils.h).

Modified status bar text when we are dragging pixels in the editor.
+ Added PixelsMovement::getImageBounds() method.
Changes in makefile.mingw to support Allegro 4.4 lib names.

Modified dist.sh to distribute correct files.
- Scripts in misc/ are distributed.
- Removed data/fonts/ directory.
- makefile.macosx is distributed.
Fixed dirs.cpp for Mac OS X to behave same as on Unix (with the addition to look for .app directory content).
Added Makefile for Mac OS X.
Added Launcher::openFile() command for Linux.
Added quotes in Launcher::openFile() to open URLs with '&' character.
Added operating system name and version in CheckUpdates command.
Fixed "Quick Reference" command. Documentation is searched in different locations depending the operating system.
Improved Launcher::openFile() method for Windows using ShellExecute() instead of system().
Minor changes to fix.sh.
Renamed makefile.mgw to makefile.mingw.
Renamed makefile.lnx to makefile.linux.
Using vsnprintf instead of vsprintf in Unix-like platforms.
Fixed a compilation error in gcc with std::sort().
Modified some cursors (hands/resize arrows) to match the main arrow cursor style.
Modified about command to show links to authors' home page.
Added CheckUpdates command.
Removed tools.cpp.
Replaced jwidget_show/hide/is_visible/is_hidden functions with Widget::isVisible/setVisible methods.
Removed jwidget_enable/disable/is_enabled/is_disabled functions.
Removed jwidget_select/deselect/set_selected/is_selected/is_deselected functions.
Added LinkLabel widget.
Refactored jlabel widget to Label class.
Added Donate command.

Added "Quick Reference" command.
- Added Launcher class to open files and URLs.
Added Vaca::convert_to<std::string>(int).
Added Vaca::format_string() for std::string.
Modified minimum scroll-bar thumb size.
Fixed scroll-bar thumb borders for horizontal scrollbar.
Added to the file selector dialog the list of recent paths (which is generated from the list of recent files).
Fixed floodfill algorithm for colors with alpha=0 but different RGB components.
Added a "star" sprite in the sheet (for bookmarks).
Converted combobox widget to a class (ComboBox class derived from Widget).
Now the separator label is drawn with other color.
Now the user can select mask color as foreground or background colors (e.g. now you can erase with right button using brush tool).
Updated copyright year to 2010 in some text files.
Fixed issue #3007917 (AUTHORS.txt does not exist anymore).
Added a WIP label in canvas dialog.
Added loadpng source code in the distribution.
Minor changes to dist.sh.
Added $zip variable in dist.sh and updated to new 0.8.0-beta version.
Now the debug information is generated in the RELEASE version when MSVC is used.
Modified makefile.vc to match Allegro 4.4 library names.
Modified 0.8.0-beta1 to 0.8.0-beta.
Modified NEWS.txt for 0.8.0 beta.
Modified comments in README.html about aseprite.cfg (now it is aseprite.ini).
Modified curve shortcut to Y key (P key is used for Frame Properties dialog).
The manifest file is included automatically when it is necessary (when dynamic C runtime is used).
DirectX libraries are included only when STATIC_ALLEG_LINK flag is used.
Added skin to scrollbar.
The number of colors in indexed sprites cannot be modified in the beta version yet (it needs more testing).
Changed "Discard" to "Don't Save" in the warning dialog when the user wants to close a modified file.
Fixed get_color_for_image() function with color indexes out of range.
Fixed problems in color curve effect using color indexes out of range.
Fixed save/load operations of .ase format for sprites with less than 256 colors.
Avoid using RGB_MAPs with invalid colors (palette index out of range).
Modified "on_color_changed" slot (in palette editor) to avoid using invalid colors.
Fixed a bug calling "palette_editor" with invalid color (index out of range).
Fixed shadow for color-bar buttons.
Sort command will not be available in the beta version.
Modified shadow (to use alpha channel) of tool-bar buttons.
Added undo information to sort command (it is WIP, is not working properly).
Now Palette:sort() generates a mapping table.
Added undo_remap_palette() function.
Added Sprite::remapImages().
The buggy resizable window patch for Allegro will be not included yet.
Minor changes in ase manual.
Modified I key shortcut in manual.
Added about the number of colors in New Sprite dialog in ASE manual.
Added possibility to sort a range of palette entries.
Added HSL_Lightness and YUV_Luma palette sort criteria.
Now the "More Options" visible status is saved in configuration file.
Modified logic to selected the default sort criteria in palette editor.
Renamed aseprite.cfg to aseprite.ini (.ini files can be opened in Windows).

Added Palette:sort() and SortPalette class.
Implemented "Sort" command in palette editor.
Minor change: eliminated compilation warning.
Added jlistbox_get_items_count() function.
Removed not-implemented jlistbox methods.
Added the missing palette commands: ramp, quantize, load, and save.
Fixed makeRectRamp() when "from" index is greater than "to" index.
Added "More Options" panel in palette editor.
Fixed size of palette editor boxes for jguiscale() > 1.
Removed death code in paledit.cpp.
Converted tabs widget to Tabs class and ITabsHandler interface.
Now the status-bar text is cleared when the mouse leave widgets like Editor and ToolBar.
The color-bar does not show invalid colors in the status-bar anymore.
Added StatusBar::clearText() member function.
Now selected colors to draw are checked in Editor::createToolLoopImpl().
Removed app_get_fg/bg_color() functions.
Modified the way invalid colors are drawn.
Fixed: now you cannot select invalid colors with the color-bar.
Fixed color_to_formalstring() for invalid colors.
Fixed draw_color() function to draw invalid colors (out of palette range).
Removed a lot of warnings from core/color.cpp
Added BITMAP* parameter in draw_emptyset_symbol() function.
Added color_is_valid() function to know if a color is inside the valid range of palette indices.
Minor modifications in the "New Sprite" dialog layout.
Added the number of colors in "New Sprite" dialog for Indexed sprites.
Added some assertions to access current palette indexes through color_t type.
Show the number of colors in sprite properties dialog.
Now the palette is created with the given number of colors.
Fixed bug in Palette::toAllegro(): Index out of range.
Removed unnecessary #include <allegro.h>
Now Editor::controlInfiniteScroll() is called when the editor's state is MOVING_PIXELS but even when the user is not dragging the pixels (just the mouse captured).
Added more methods to handle decorators (still WIP) in Editor class.
Added Editor::editor_set_zoom_and_center_in_mouse to remove duplicated code.
Added "Selection Tools" section.
ase64.ico moved to docs/manuals/images directory.
Fixed cursors problem when the user is dragging pixels.
Renamed PixelsMovement::m_isCatched (which should be Caught) to m_isDragging.
Fixed clipping problems dragging selected pixels when other windows are opened.

Improved pixel-movement: Added support for continuos movement even when we release the mouse button.
The mouse is captured by the editor until the user presses a key (e.g. to execute a command) or uses the selection tool to add/subtract chunks of mask. While the mouse is captured we are in the "pixels movement" loop.
Fixed problems with cel position alignment in Undoable::clear_mask and paste_image members functions.
Added jmessage_new_copy_without_dests() to copy messages without copying the list of recipients.
Updated copyright to 2010.
Added buttons in Options dialog to change grid colors (normal grid and pixel grid).
Added an option in Tools Configuration dialog to show the pixel grid.
The Editor can draw the pixel grid.
Added "pixel grid" in ISettings interface.
Minor modification in tools_configuration window layout.
Moved "Cursor Color" setting from "Tools Configuration" to "Options" dialog.
Changed caption of the palette editor to "Palette".

Modified color selector (tabs replaced with buttons).
Mask button now is just one button (you don't need to select tab and then the "mask button").
Fixed colorbutton_draw().
The color selector in color-buttons appears only when they are clicked.
PopupWindow have not yellow background anymore.
Removed unused value in draw_color().
Avoid to reserve caption space in popup windows that do not have a caption.
Minor fixes for short color format in color_to_formalstring() function.
Color buttons for checked-bg have imgtype=IMAGE_RGB.
Added validation in "Grid Settings" dialog to avoid negative grid width/height.

Added "checked background configuration".
Now you can configure size and color of the checked background
used in transparent sprites.
Added more width to default combobox size.

Removed mouse speed option.
Removed _setup_mouse_speed() function and dialog/options.cpp file.
All the code is in cmd_options.cpp now.
Added grid_settings command (feature #2874433).
Modified "Tools Configuration" window layout.

Added support for vertical separators:
- New PART_SEPARATOR_VERT in skin.
- New SkinneableTheme::draw_part_as_vline() function.
Modified default bounds of "palette editor" window.
Sprite Properties window now uses a grid.
Fixed possible dead-pointers deleting a widget.
Moved icons to data/icons/ directory.

Refactored all jwidget_has_focus/mouse/capture functions to member functions.
Added Widget::hasFocus/Mouse/Capture and Widget::hasMouseOver() members.
Removed JI_HARDCAPTURE flag (it was used only by button widget).

Now the user can move selected pixels (still WIP).
Details:
Added EDITOR_STATE_MOVING_PIXELS state to Editor.
Added PixelsMovement helper class.
Added Undoable::paste_image().
Added Editor::controlInfiniteScroll() member function.
Fixed: You cannot change the frame or fg/bg color when you are drawing using the mouse wheel.
Added support to load .ico files (still WIP).
Fixed "minwidth" attribute of "brush_size" field.
Added ToolInk::isCelMovement(). Now "Move" tool moves cel.

Refactored 'extras' stuff in Sprite class.
Now it is called "ExtraCel" which is the union of a Cel and an Image.

Now when you pass the mouse over a tool button, the tool name and shortcut are shown in the status bar.
Added StatusBar::showTool().
Fixed a bug in convert_xmlelement_to_widget() setting maxwidth when only minwidth where specified.

Added "wheel actions". The new behavior for the mouse wheel is this:
wheel=zoom,
alt+wheel=change fg color,
ctrl+wheel=change frame.
Better feedback for eyedropper tool (now the eyedropper tool is controlled by the editor as "Alt+click").
State bar shows alpha value when a color is being shown.
Removed MODE_VERBOSE in beta version.
Improved color indicators in status bar (StatusBar::showColor()).
Added support for alpha (in skin graphics) in ToolStrip JM_DRAW message.
Updated about text.
The ToolStrip is shown only for ToolGroups with more than just one tool (bug reported by Ilija).

Now SkinneableTheme::draw_bounds*() member functions
receive destination BITMAP. With this we eliminated all
hacks of the ji_screen <-> double-buffer switching style.
Added alpha support for skin sheet.
Fixed problem in CurrentGfxModeGuard changing gfxmode when it is not necessary.

Fixed problem with Ctrl+mouse wheel over the color-bar (reported by Ilija).
Renamed ColorBar::m_colorsPerColum to m_colorsPerColumn.
Fixed problem picking non-indexed colors.
Removed unused local variable "imgtype".
Added SkinneableTheme::reload_skin() to reload the skin sheet.png file when you press F5.
Fixed OpenFilecommand::execute() to open files with errors (these errors in loading process are shown anyway).
New icons for tools by iLKke.
Some PRINTFs in gui_flip_screen() to catch the lost screen bug.
More PRINTF in execute_command() to trace execution of commands.
Added ASE_BETA flag in config.h
Added a possible fix to bug #2980428. It needs some testing.

Added GfxMode and CurrentGfxModeGuard classes.
Now ConfigureScreen command uses these classes.
Moved some files from ASE_SOURCES to COMMON_SOURCES.
Fixed a couple of warning for comparisons between size_t and int.

Added getRgbMap() methods to Sprite class.
Added Palette* parameter to image_to_allegro() function and Image::to_allegro().
Removed orig_rgb_map.
Removed rgb_map usage (the Allegro global variable).
Fixed thumbnails generation of cels (using the palette of the cel's frame).
Added RgbMap class (this class will replace rgb_map Allegro usage).
Added Palette::m_modifications member.
Replaced jwidget_flush_redraw recursiveness with a std::queue.
Changed calls from jwidget_pick to Widget::pick.
Added -O3 and -DNDEBUG flags in PROFILE mode with gcc compiler.
Fixed bug #2988166 compilation error in unix (EBUSY undefined).
Fixed compilation error in gcc (cstdarg is need for va_list).
Quantize a palette for RGB images when they are loaded.
Fixed a bug in update_sliders_from_color().
Fixed palette_editor_change_hook() to update entry widgets.

Removed Context::getFg/BgColor member functions.
Modified color_get_*() so they do not need "imgtype" parameter.
ColorBar class is public (defined in colbar.h).
Added ColorBar::Fg/BgColorChange signals.
Converted palette editor widget to a C++ class (PalEdit derived from Widget).
Modified the "Palette Editor" (F4 key) to be non-modal (still WIP).
Context class is Vaca::NonCopyable now.
Updated dist.sh script to new paths for widgets/ and skins/.
Minor modifications in the layout of "Tools Configuration" window.
Added "looklike" attribute in <check> and <radio> XML elements.
Added jmanager_timer_is_running() function to know if a timer is running.
Fixed: jwidget_flush_redraw() does not generate JM_DRAW messages for hidden widgets anymore.
Modified version indicator in about window.
Added some notes about source code.
Added SkinneableTheme::m_selected_skin member and "[Skin]/Selected" configuration variable to change the selected skin.
Moved data/jids/*.jid files to data/widgets/*.xml.
More delay for Editor::flashCurrentLayer().
GotoPrev/NextLayerCommands do not show tooltip.
Modified IntertwineAsLines::fillPoints to draw the contour too (so the shape of the final polygon is more like the previewed-contour).
Only unknown exceptions (invalid memory access, etc) are not caught in debug mode.
Clicking fg/bg colors open the palette editor.
Fixed a bug in JM_DRAW handler of colorviewer_msg_proc() function. It was introduced in a recent commit.
Fixed somekind of bug (it could happen when we access to invalid memory).
Updated dist.sh script.
Removed ChangeLog because it is not updated anymore.
Default color for new files is current selected "Background Color".
Added vsync to flashCurrentLayer.
Extras are drawn only when extras-opacity > 0.
Added Editor::flashCurrentLayer() for when the current layer is changed.
StatusBar::showTip now show the text in the same status-bar too (redrawing it).
Buttons in the status bar now give us the possibility to change the current layer.
Fixed Sprite(const Sprite&) constructor.
Removed unused forward declaration.
Fix bug in LayerImage::get_cels(). (it was introduced in commit cbc0bf22bde2287cc697737ebf52d349fa1d15f8)
Fixed: cursor preview is not shown anymore when animation is being played.
After converting sprite image type, 'extras' are regenerated.
Refactored Sprite class: no public variable members, all functions sprite_* go as Sprite function members, pimpl idiom.
More const-correctness in some functions.
Added missing #include <cassert>

Added Vaca::Application and Vaca/main.h, and removed Vaca::System.
Now the application compiles with MinGW.
Fixed some GCC warnings and errors.
Removed some warnings in ase_format.cpp.
Modified NEWS.txt.
Updated dist.sh file (not tested yet).

Added parameters to new_layer command ("ask" and "name").
Now by default this command does not ask to the user about the layer name.
The state-bar shows the name of the current layer when there is just one layer.
Fixed a couple of compiler warnings.
Status bar widget converted to C++ StatusBar class.
Removed the big-layer button from the state-bar.
Fixed bugs when the current tool was used in an hidden/locked layer.

Modified state-bar to show the stack of layers.
Removed the sprite & undo size indicators (completely useless).
Fixed minor problem with color-bar and JM_REQSIZE message.
Background/padding color in Animator Editor is equal to Sprite Editor one (from SkinneableTheme).
Fixed some strange bugs that appears when a exception is thrown in file-loading process.
Added compressed images (with zlib) to .ase format.
Moved "ncolor" field in .ase format to next WORD position (the "unknown field" looks like a DWORD).
Exceptions are caught in open/save command threads.
Mouse wheel+shift in color-bar jumps entire columns.

Modified Palette class to contain all functions to manipulate it as function members.
Modified its implementation to use std::vector<> instead of a raw C array[].
Now the number of colors in the sprite is more relevant (e.g. we should be able to create sprites of 4bpp, 16 colors).
Removed dead code in cmd_open_file.cpp.
Added RecentFiles C++ class to replace legacy C implementation of recent files.
Removed tooltip window and refresh_timer stuff in new color-bar.
New simplified color-bar (still WIP).
Minor TODO modifications.
Some error reporting if skin.xml contains invalid cursors.
Minor change: Replaced one JRect to Vaca::Rect.
Hand tool now really scrolls.
Added more information in About dialog.
Modified about string.
Minor change: C++ comment style.
JM_DESTROY message cannot be used in derived classes of Widget.
Minor modification to comments.
Now draw_emptyset_symbol() uses a Vaca::Rect instead of JRect.
Added jdraw_rectfill() with a Vaca::Rect as parameter.
Removed unused variables.
ASE will be the name for the next release.

Fixed bug in LayerImage::destroy_all_cels() using cel_is_link() in deleted cels.
Removed cel_is_link() function because link cels do not exist anymore.
Fixed a lot of important bugs in clipping code.
Fixed: multiple-error messages when files specified in arguments are not found.
Fixed a bug in CheckArgs::clear().
Parts are specified in skin.xml now.
Smaller bottom area for tabs widget.
Modified some tool icons.
Added mini-look to tabs buttons.
Fixed SkinneableTheme::draw_bounds() when the rectangle is too short (in width).
Cursors coordinates are specified in the default_skin.xml now.
Converted color bar widget to ColorBar class.
Fixed bug clearing tool icons.
Fixed bug 'preview cursor is not visible in indexed images when fg-color is 0' adding Image::mask_color field.
Removed _index_cmap. It was used to remap colors of the current palette (useful in 8 bpp modes).
Removed real-time dithering option (because 8 bpp is not supported anymore).
Now windows threads implementation uses CreateThread instead of _beginthread.
Minilook for group of buttons (groupbut and buttons in "target" selector).
When the mouse leaves the color-bar the status bar is cleared.
When a file is closed now the status bar says something about it.
Removed about screen with authors.txt
Fixed a little problem with text in draw_slider() overlapping bottom border.
Fixed some problems in jrectexclude() when y1==ey1 or y2==ye2.
Applied jguiscale() to tooltips borders.
Removed tips.
Removed asm code.
Added vaca/include directory in the script to calculate dependencies.
Now PreviewFilled configuration field is for tool.
Removed support for 8 bpp.
Updated "to do" list.
Added tooltips to toolbar.
Modified version to 0.8.0.
Still "allegro sprite editor"
Remove references to old-subversion repository in readme file.
Applied jguiscale() to tooltip location.
Minor modification drawing polygon outline.
Added "Options/PreviewFilled" configuration option to see preview in real-time of filled shapes.
Replaced algo_polygon() with GD library implementation.
Preview of a filled polygon is a closed outline now.
Removed inexistent win32/Mutex.cpp file from VACA_SOURCES.
Added missing Property.cpp file.
Disabled warning 4251 in MSC.
Fixed a typo.
Fixed cursors focus when jguiscale > 1.
Minor modifications to state bar JM_DRAW message handler.
Changed initial text in state bar.
Fixed buttons in toolbar for jguiscale > 1.
mini-look for buttons in file selector dialog.
Added setup_mini_look() function.
Removed unused variable in gui_setup_screen().
Added mini-look to the opacity slider in the cel property dialog.
Fixed default-size for combo-box window (finally).
Fixed SkinneableTheme::draw_bounds() for small rectangles.
Removed unused functions subclip/backclip.
Modified state-bar borders to match Ilija's mockup.
Now buttons and sliders in the state-bar have mini-look.
Added mini-look (SkinProperty::isMiniLook) to buttons and sliders.
Fixed a flicker problem when the slider of layer-opacity in the state bar were used.
Added SkinProperty.
Fixed convert_to problems.
Added properties to Component class.
Imported SharedPtr.h header file from Vaca library.
Applied guiscale to tabs widget.
State-bar is double-buffered now.
Applied jguiscale to status bar borders.
Applied jguiscale to color bar.
Added Editor::editor_move_cursor to avoid drawing cursor preview flickering.
Vaca::details::trace_t renamed to Tracer.
Warning 4996 is disabled only in MSC compiler.

Added Vaca::String class.
Added Vaca::Exception class.
Added Vaca::System class.
Added vaca_main().
The main/WinMain is defined inside vaca library.
Modified default target platform (calculated through current compiler).
Added WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN to speedup compilation time.
Removed jpoint.h and jsize.h.
Removed <windows.h>, <commctrl.h> and <algorithm> from Vaca/base.h.
Moved vaca/README.txt comments to third_party/README.txt.

Moved vaca lib to third_party directory.
Fixed a problem compiling MutexImpl for win32.
REnamed MutexPimpl to MutexImpl.
Added some TODO.

Added Vaca::Mutex.
Now Vaca is compiled as a library (.lib/.a).
Removed jmutex.cpp, jpoint.cpp, jsize.cpp.
Added a common .gitignore file.
More documentation about Lasso tool.
Removed 'Advanced mode' option.
image_impl.h does not include allegro.h anymore
Split _ji_set_font_of_all_widgets() in _ji_reinit_theme_in_all_widgets().
More jguiscale() usage.
Added jwidget_set_border(JWidget,int) function.
Gui is regenerated and font is reloaded when the jguiscale() changes.
Now the default font is loaded from the skin (skins/default_skin_font.pcx).
Now ji_font_load_bmp() uses ji_apply_guiscale() to resize the bitmap font.
Renamed apply_gui_scale() to ji_apply_guiscale().
Removed conditions about JI_INITIALIZED in SkinneableTheme::init_widget().

Removed guiscale() from ASE and added jguiscale() in Jinete.
With this change we can apply jguiscale() in some places like jalert and jfiles.
The ConfigureScreen now shows the current screen resolution if it is not in the combo box.

Added underline_height in jdraw_text() function.
Removed jdraw_widget_text() (deprecated).
Replaced hline() with rectfill() in jrectexclude(). A lot of hlines() directly in the screen are really slow.

- All tools stuff refactored in various files/components.
- Added classes: IToolLoop, Tool, ToolGroup, ToolInk, ToolController, ToolPointShape, ToolIntertwine, ToolBox, etc.
- Added ToolLoopManager.
- Removed old src/modules/tools.cpp.
- Added ISettings and UISettingsImpl, adding the tools settings (onion skinning, grid, tiled mode, etc.).
- Added App::PenSizeBeforeChange, PenSizeAfterChange, CurrentToolChange signals.
- Renamed Context::get_bg/fg_color to getBg/FgColor.
- Refactored Brush class to Pen and added PenType.
- Renamed tiled_t to TiledMode.
- get_config_rect now uses the new Rect class imported from Vaca instead of old jrect.
- Added default_skin.xml to load tool icons.
- Added pen preview in Editor::cursor stuff.
- Added Editor::decorators.

Note: This big patch is from some time ago. I did my best to pre-commit other small changes before this big one.
Added Ctrl+Shift+Z to redo.
Fixed a little syntax error.

Applied guiscale() to some skinneable widgets.

Removed try{}catch in DEBUGMODE to get the exception in the debugger.

Resort includes.

Limited scroll movement (related to feature request #2874441).
Now clipboard::cut() deselects the mask.

Changing ASE name to aseprite.

 entity (because now we use TinyXml parser).

Modified news, and some tips.
Added resizable capability (with a patched version of Allegro). It must be enabled through the special flag HAVE_RESIZE_PATCH.
Now fix.bat uses notepad.

Fixed a couple of bugs:
+ in tabs_remove_tab selected/hot tabs are set to NULL.
+ the select_callback is called only for the hot tab (if hot is NULL, now the selected is not used anymore).

Fixed assert in loadpng.c for debug version.
Added support for the Close button in the system window.
Fixed little details in tabs gfxs.
Removed "Nothing" tab (Ilija Melentijevic idea).

Removed JM_DRAWRGN message. Removed jwidget_redraw_region and jwidget_send_message_after_type functions.

Fixed Undoable::background_from_layer when the layer to be converted to background has empty cels.

New version 0.7.1 released.

+ Added a progress bar in the file-selector to show the progress of thumbnail generation.

Modified file name where ASE configuration is saved.

Fixed bug #2511762 (thanks to Clayton Enga for the patch).
